sub_title: Member, Board of Advisory at Rural Community Development Society RCDS
summary:
Background Summary : Involved in the garments, textile, trading and development field of Bangladesh since 2003. Continue to grow in leadership and knowledge, excellence in innovative application, interact and share with team members and colleagues, and try to increase the competence and prestige of the profession. More than seven years of experience in garments, textile and trading field five to six years of experience in development NGO sector. Make some success that establish a Bangla German Solar  Academy in Ctg Bangladesh by the grant of German www.bgsabd.org so Desire to build a dynamic career through honesty. discipline, hard working and build up a prospective career .

Dream Summary : I follow the life style of “NUN”  Who give his/her life for humanity. I want to work for save that life, which make plan to suicide himself. Want to work with them ! who are cheated by everyone who are knocking door to door for jobs. Want to work who have not any quality & experience, which have no any money for invest. An expert and dishonest man touch the success easily but an non-expert man don't touch that in our country. Is it right ? Every academy, who have scholar student only 5% and 45% normal student 50% is week student. It is easy to work with 5% who will develop by public/gov money and make his life colorful which color is not helpful for us.I want to work with 50% who have no way to do anything but who are honest & non-addicts. I am sure my Allah will help me on my every site.

Leadership and community development is incessant endeavors me which motivate to go along with several organizations ( Rotary, Rotaract, CCA64, B3, VBD, Jaago, Yees, RCDS, Friday, SBSF, GSBIF,CPGE ETC.

Specialties : Web Development | SEO | SEM | SMM | PPC | Internet Marketing l Affiliate Marketing | Google Adsense | ( In IT Sector ) All type of Business Communication.Commercial,Custom and Banking work ( In Trading Sector ) PP l EOI l RFP l RFQ l with all type of tender Submitting.

awards.description: Rotaract is an excellent platform to nurture imparts leadership virtue into its members and give a big opportunity to make a global network and the DRR's Representative is the most prestigious and responsible authority to continue this effort.
awards.issuer: District Special Honor "District Highest Official Post"

awards.title: Best Sgt-at-arms At Rotasia 2009
awards.description: South East Asian Rotaract Conference (Rotasia) 2009 was held at Seagull Hotel Cox's Bazar Chittagong Bangladesh,by Rotary International District 3280. Thank You ! all to be part of this great program and also them who are selected  us .Bangladesh, is well known for its Natural diversity, Culture, Humanity, Mountain, Peace, Weather and Hospitality.The fellowship with Asian Rotaract it’s  an great opportunity.All through the year, we reach out to Rotary communities across the Asia .
awards.issuer: South East Asian Rotaract Conference RID-3280 Bangladesh

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Business Development concerning opening new markets, managing the business development plan for presenting new items for the local and international market. Make a good relationship with new global market for Big O Solution Ltd..

Big O Solution Ltd. is a Sister Concern of Heaven Group, It is a software & Web outsourcing company that focuses on highly qualitative, timely delivered and cost-effective offshore software development. With a rich and varied experience in providing offshore software development and project management capabilities and stringent quality standards ensure us to develop solutions that give your business an edge over your competitors. Our Local & global software outsourcing model makes sure we deliver maximum targeted result to you.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for make social development strategy, developing international reletion with RCDS around the world, help to making strategic decisions for local rural community development.

Rural Community Development Society (RCDS) is a non-profit voluntary organization conceived in 2001 by the group of social activist with the noble aims of establishing enlightened.That’s why; keeping similarity with the Millennium Development Goal (MDG), RCDS has been working since its inception with disadvantaged group of people, in order to l become potential actors in changing the society after being trained up on different need-based and hands-on training in accordance with market demands.RCDS focuses on Renewable Energy Efficiency (REE) to save the earth from green House effect as well as increasing job opportunity. http://www.rcdsbd.org
profile_positions.title: Member, Board of Advisory

profile_positions.description: I am Feel Proud to build a 1st all RFSM Rotaract Club In Bangladesh. Rotaract Club of Baridhara believe "The Power of Leadership " Rotaract Club of Baridhara will contribute T.R.F and all member become RFSM Member. I am proud to make my RC Baridhara largest community-based Rotaract Club in the World. My Club is comprised of talented young professionals who demonstrate a capacity for leadership, intelligence, proven work ethic and integrity. Rotaract offers its dynamic members a forum to better understand and promote the characteristics of responsible citizenship and effective leadership. We accomplish this by interacting with our community's business, government and civic leaders, networking with other young professionals, and addressing community service needs of our local area and beyond.Our focus on these key areas of our community allows us to live out our club's motto: LEARN, SOCIALIZE AND SERVE
profile_positions.title: Founder/Charter Board Member & Past President
